posts.post_content:
Evening all,

Have a near complete collection of T205 Cubs front reverses.  Looking to upgrade 10 cards.  Would like PSA3 or SGC 40 or above. Have roughly 15 lower grade T205 cards that I can use for trade purposes.  Cards I am looking for are as follows:

James Archer Sovereign 
Mordecai Brown Hassan 30
Frank Chance Polar Bear
Johnny Evers Honest Long Cut
Ed Reulbach American Beauty
Jas Sheckard Honest Long Cut



PM me with what you have and scans and asking prices. If interested in trades.

Email or PM for scans for sale or trade.


Thanks,

Ken
Kmac32
